name: Do robots dream of human sleep?
name_original: Do robots dream of human sleep?
description:
Robots are not alive or living

They only give an illusion of life...

Do robots dream of human sleep? (or DRDHS?) is a point-and-click/platformer game based on the premise of artificial intelligence. It follows you embarking on the quest to complete your mission in some of the ruined houses of the destroyed robot city of Heirodyne, to carry the lost souls to their destination.
